This function adds a block for drawing.

transform The transformation matrix to apply when drawing.

Method to find out if the terrain should be drawn or not.

true if the terrain should be drawn, false otherwise.

bool  clearList = true

This function draws the list of terrain blocks.

virtual void Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::drawSingle ( BaseRenderTerrainBlock *  pBlock,
const Matrix &  transform,
Moo::EffectMaterialPtr  altMat = NULL,
bool  useCachedLighting = false 
) [pure virtual]

This function asks the renderer to immediately draw the terrain block.

The block is not added to the render list. The caller must maintain render context transform state. By default the cached lighting is not used - the caller must set lighting before call.

Parameters:
pBlock The block to render.
transform World transform for block.
altMat An alternative drawing material.
useCachedLighting Use cached lighting state or renderer lighting state. Used by Terrain2 only.

Implemented in Terrain::TerrainRenderer1, and Terrain::TerrainRenderer2.

bool Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::enableHoleMap ( bool  value  ) 

This method sets a flag that indicates whether or not hole map is used during terrain texture rendering.

Returns:
old value of the flag

void Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::enableSpecular ( bool  enable  )  [inline]

Tell the renderer that it should/shouldn't use specular lighting.

This method is used by the chunk photographer class in WE.

Parameters:
true to use specular in the terrain, false otherwise.

bool Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::holeMapEnabled (  )  const [inline]

This method reads a flag that indicates whether or not hole map is used during terrain texture rendering.

BaseTerrainRenderer * Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::instance (  )  [static]

This method is a wrapper for the manager's currentRenderer getter method.

Returns:
instance of the current terrain renderer. If no terrain renderer has been set, it returs a pointer to a dummy renderer that does nothing.

Reimplemented in Terrain::TerrainRenderer1, and Terrain::TerrainRenderer2.

void Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::instance ( BaseTerrainRenderer *  newInstance  )  [static]

This method is a wrapper for the manager's currentRenderer setter method.

At the moment, TerrainRenderer1 and TerrainRenderer2 call this method when they are inited to set themselves as the current renderer.

Parameters:
newInstance pointer to the current terrain renderer, or NULL to disable terrain rendering.

void Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::isVisible ( bool  value  )  [inline]

This method sets the visibility flag for the renderer.

bool Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::specularEnabled (  )  const [inline]

Method to find out if the terrain should be drawn with specular highlights or not.

This method is used by the chunk photographer class in WE.

Returns:
true if using specular in the terrain, false otherwise.

virtual uint32 Terrain::BaseTerrainRenderer::version (  )  [pure virtual]

Get the version of the terrain renderer.

Returns:
terrain renderer version, 0 if no terrain renderer instance has been set.

Implemented in Terrain::TerrainRenderer1, and Terrain::TerrainRenderer2.
